assignmentCompatability44.ts(5,7): error TS2322: Type '{ new(x: number): Foo; prototype: Foo; }' is not assignable to type 'new() => Foo'.
  Target signature provides too few arguments. Expected 1 or more, but got 0.


==== assignmentCompatability44.ts (1 errors) ====
    class Foo {
        constructor(x: number) {}
    }
    
    const foo: { new(): Foo } = Foo;
          ~~~
!!! error TS2322: Type '{ new(x: number): Foo; prototype: Foo; }' is not assignable to type 'new() => Foo'.
!!! error TS2322:   Target signature provides too few arguments. Expected 1 or more, but got 0.
